attributes.action: stop legislating to FORCE people to behave "with respect" and instead ENCOURAGE people to behave "with respect" through community education and awareness programmes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Creating laws in the name of "the respect agenda" to force people to behave in a certain way will never work - it only creates anger and resentment towards the state (and more criminals). Encouraging people to behave respectfully by their own free will is the only way to achieve a truly respectful, caring community.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
